DocAttribute.Name: ParentContext
DocAttribute.Documentation: Parent context from which the sub context derives its world coordinate system, precision, space coordinate dimension and true north.

DocAttribute.Name: TargetScale
DocAttribute.Documentation:
The target plot scale of the representation to which this representation context applies. > Scale indicates the target plot scale for the representation sub context, all annotation styles are given in plot dimensions according to this target plot scale.
If multiple instances of IfcGeometricRepresentationSubContext are given having the same TargetView value, the target plot scale applies up to the next smaller scale, or up to unlimited small scale.

Note: Scale 1:100 (given as 0.01 within TargetScale) is bigger then 1:200 (given as 0.005 within TargetScale).

DocAttribute.Name: TargetView
DocAttribute.Documentation: Target view of the representation to which this representation context applies.

DocAttribute.Name: UserDefinedTargetView
DocAttribute.Documentation: User defined target view, this attribute value shall be given, if the TargetView attribute is set to USERDEFINED.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR31
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The parent context shall not be another geometric representation sub context.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR32
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The attribute _UserDefinedTargetView_ shall be given, if the attribute _TargetView_ is set to USERDEFINED.
